description: Situated in the town centre, this colourful and discreetly elegant restaurant offers friendly and professional service. The classic cuisine served here is modern in style, offering a choice of meat and fish dishes as well as a convenient business lunch menu. In summer, tables are arranged outdoors on the terrace and in the small courtyard.
creditCards: ['American Express credit card', ' Credit card / Debit card accepted', ' Mastercard credit card', ' Visa credit card']
